metadata.title: CVE-2022-29023 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the razermouse driver ofOpenRazer up to version v3.3.0 allows attackers to cause a Denial ofService (DoS) and possibly escalate their privileges via a crafted buffersent to the matrix_custom_frame device.

criterions.comment: openrazer package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
